description: Utökar missionlistan med några häftiga funktioner!
name: Utökad uppdragslista

collapsableMissionsAllBtn.description: Shows a button to collapse all missions at once
collapsableMissionsAllBtn.title: Collapse all missions at once

currentPrisoners.description: Shows current amount of prisoners for each mission
currentPrisoners.title: Current Prisoners

currentPrisonersInTooltips.description: Shows current amount of prisoners also in the tooltips on the map.
currentPrisonersInTooltips.title: Current Prisoners in Tooltips

fixedEventInfo.description: Displays the info about a running event permanently, no matter how far you have scrolled in the missions list.
fixedEventInfo.title: Always show event info

hide0CurrentPrisoners.description: Hides amount of prisoners if there are no prisoners at scene
hide0CurrentPrisoners.title: Hide 0 Prisoners

remainingTime.description: Visar vid uppdrag hur länge varje uppdrag fortfarande pågår.
remainingTime.title: uppdragstid endast för gröna uppdrag
